column5: 850 sq ft 1 bedroom 1 bath apartment located the galleria. Great location on site gym or 24 hr fitness located in walking distance along various bars, restaurants and nightclubs in the area. If you don't have a car uber won't cost you much.  Hardwood floors, quite neighborhood, strong AC, high speed wifi cable and Apple TV on site. Laundry room located in the apartment feel free to use.
